name: 王世榮
objective:
課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、殼類家具結構特性等。
This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board,, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.
schedule:
周次     內容
   01    課程大綱與成績評量說明 
   02    家具產品工程的認識 
   03    家具結構力學的認識
   04    家具結構設計的認識 
   05    木材特性與家具結構的關係 
   06    木釘接合強度設計 
   07    方榫接合強度設計 
   08    浮動結構設計 
   09    期中考或模型作品
   10    板類結構的特性
   11    櫥櫃擱板撓度試驗 
   12    系統櫥櫃模組化設計 
   13     KD 類五金結構的認識
   14    門板類與抽屜類五金結構的認識
   15    五金結構的認識
   16    其它五金結構的認識
   17    家具結構成本的認識 
   18    期末考或模型作品
scorePolicy:
出席率 + 議題討論 + 作業 (40%),
期中作業 30%
期末測驗 30%
materials:
家具結構模型之設計與製作  SBN13：9789868924291
出版社：六合
作者：林東陽；楊明津
出版日：2015/04/01

Rudolph Willard (1975) Furniture Construction, NCSU (North Carolina State University. College of Engineering), Raleigh. ASIN : B001U3HL94

Bertram, N. (2013) Furniture, structure, infrastructure: Making and using the urban environment. Melbourne: Routledge.
ISBN-13: 978-1409449270
ISBN-10: 1409449270

Haeusler, M, Muehlbauer, M, Bohnenberger, S and Burry, J (2017), 'Furniture design
using custom-optimised structural nodes', in P. Janssen, P. Loh, A. Raonic, M. A.
Schnabel (ed.) Proceedings of the 22nd International Conference of the Association
for Computer-Aided Architectural Design Research in Asia 2017 - Protocols, Flows
and Glitches, Suzhou, China, 5-8 April 2017, pp. 841-851.
